00037 #ifndef OSC_INTERNAL_H
00038 #define OSC_INTERNAL_H
00039 
00040 #define OAP_MAGIC 8675309
00041 
00042 extern atomic_t osc_pool_req_count;
00043 extern unsigned int osc_reqpool_maxreqcount;
00044 extern struct ptlrpc_request_pool *osc_rq_pool;
00045 
00046 struct lu_env;
00047 
00048 enum async_flags {
00049         ASYNC_READY = 0x1, /* ap_make_ready will not be called before this
00050                               page is added to an rpc */
00051         ASYNC_URGENT = 0x2, /* page must be put into an RPC before return */
00052         ASYNC_COUNT_STABLE = 0x4, /* ap_refresh_count will not be called
00053                                      to give the caller a chance to update
00054                                      or cancel the size of the io */
00055         ASYNC_HP = 0x10,
00056 };
00057 
00058 struct osc_async_page {
00059         int                     oap_magic;
00060         unsigned short          oap_cmd;
00061         unsigned short          oap_interrupted:1;
00062 
00063         struct list_head        oap_pending_item;
00064         struct list_head        oap_rpc_item;
00065 
00066         loff_t                  oap_obj_off;
00067         unsigned                oap_page_off;
00068         enum async_flags        oap_async_flags;
00069 
00070         struct brw_page         oap_brw_page;
00071 
00072         struct ptlrpc_request   *oap_request;
00073         struct client_obd       *oap_cli;
00074         struct osc_object       *oap_obj;
00075 
00076         spinlock_t               oap_lock;
00077 };
00078 
00079 #define oap_page        oap_brw_page.pg
00080 #define oap_count       oap_brw_page.count
00081 #define oap_brw_flags   oap_brw_page.flag
00082 
00083 static inline struct osc_async_page *brw_page2oap(struct brw_page *pga)
00084 {
00085         return (struct osc_async_page *)container_of(pga, struct osc_async_page,
00086                                                      oap_brw_page);
00087 }

00092         struct osc_async_page  *ocw_oap;
00093         int                     ocw_grant;
00094         int                     ocw_rc;
00095 };

00158 extern struct lu_device_type osc_device_type;
00159 
00160 static inline int osc_recoverable_error(int rc)
00161 {
00162         return (rc == -EIO || rc == -EROFS || rc == -ENOMEM ||
00163                 rc == -EAGAIN || rc == -EINPROGRESS);
00164 }
00165 
00166 static inline unsigned long rpcs_in_flight(struct client_obd *cli)
00167 {
00168         return cli->cl_r_in_flight + cli->cl_w_in_flight;
00169 }
00170 
00171 static inline char *cli_name(struct client_obd *cli)
00172 {
00173         return cli->cl_import->imp_obd->obd_name;
00174 }
00175 
00176 #ifndef min_t
00177 #define min_t(type,x,y) \
00178         ({ type __x = (x); type __y = (y); __x < __y ? __x: __y; })
00179 #endif
00180 
00181 struct osc_device {
00182         struct cl_device    od_cl;
00183         struct obd_export  *od_exp;
00184 
00185         /* Write stats is actually protected by client_obd's lock. */
00186         struct osc_stats {
00187                 uint64_t     os_lockless_writes;          /* by bytes */
00188                 uint64_t     os_lockless_reads;           /* by bytes */
00189                 uint64_t     os_lockless_truncates;       /* by times */
00190         } od_stats;
00191 
00192         /* configuration item(s) */
00193         int                 od_contention_time;
00194         int                 od_lockless_truncate;
00195 };
00196 
00197 static inline struct osc_device *obd2osc_dev(const struct obd_device *d)
00198 {
00199         return container_of0(d->obd_lu_dev, struct osc_device, od_cl.cd_lu_dev);
00200 }
